application.name: isiscomplete
application.brief: Outputs the completion command for any Isis application

description.p: This program is used to load tcsh tab-completion settings for all Isis applications. This program will NOT run in GUI mode! Call this program like this: eval `isiscomplete isisapp [isisapp2 isisapp3 ...]`

history.change: isiscomplete now does not complete itself and does not complete when isis is in debug mode
This program now handles qview properly
This program now handles isisui properly
Changed the call to Application to provide compatability withg Qt startup requirements.
